CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: C has just picked up a pot
M taps a toy on table
C takes toy from M; M reaches in house for another
M points to object near her
a toy drops on floor; C goes to pick it up
M points at toy C has picked up
M points at a bed; C puts a toy in it
M touches toy held by C
C puts toy in bed with other toy
C tries to put dog in bed; a toy falls out
M laughs; C gets a table out of house
C lays a toy on the table; M laughs
toy fell off table; C puts it back on
C tries to put back on
C picks up toys from their beds
C begins manipulating toys alone; M watches
M laughs; C picks up a pot
C pulls her chair more closely to table
C reaches for teapot; pours in a cup
C points in book she is holding
M begins reading out of book she is holding; C looks at her own book while repaeting what M says
C reaches and touches a picture
M refers to C touching a picture
C closes book she was holding; it was Care Bear book
C is busy opening a new book
C looks at book M holds
C starts to close book M is reading to herself
